MemeDef.label: necrolatry
MemeDef.description: Life is temporary, Death is eternal.

rulesStrings.li: episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->[deity0_name] Taught us about death and it's gifts.
intro(tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [memberNamePlural] [revelationAdverb], teaching them the true meaning of death.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->A [place_job] named [founderName] was blessed by [deity0_name] and gained miraculous knowledge about the importance of death.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->[founderName] Thaught the masses about death and it's importance.
lesson(tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->each person's life is surrounded by the deaths of others
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->In the end, those that accept death will find peace.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->Archotechs stand as the arbiters of life and death.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->The archotecs will brin death to all the universe, just to create it anew.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->Before everything, there was only a pantheon spirits. Once one of them died, it began to give birth to everything else.
animistFact(tag=meme_Necrolatry) ->Every spirit dies to nourish and expand our world, and we all should follow their example.
